findings.rationale: The indefinite duration may expose the Receiving Party to perpetual obligations without a clear end, which can lead to unforeseen liabilities.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Limitation on Confidential Information
findings.rationale: The broad definition of Confidential Information may create ambiguity and lead to disputes over what constitutes confidential material.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party.

findings.rationale: The obligation to return all Confidential Information may be difficult to track and enforce, leading to potential compliance issues.
findings.evidence_quote: Upon termination, the Receiving Party shall return all Confidential Information to the Disclosing Party.
